text: Greatest hits might mean: *Greatest hits album, a compilation album of previously released songs that were very successful hits of a particular music artist or band Specific albums: * All the Greatest Hits, by McFly *Greatest Hits: My Prerogative by Britney Spears *Greatest Hits (Chris Gaines album) *Greatest Hits (Guns N' Roses album) *Greatest Hits (Mariah Carey album) *Greatest Hits (Selena album) *Greatest Hits (Social Distortion album)
title: Greatest Hits
